content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with current inventory: {'iron-plate': 59}
  
### Copper Plate Furnace at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with current inventory: {'copper-plate': 51}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace status
- Check the furnace for available ingredients before attempting to smelt, as it may return a "no ingredients to smelt" warning.
